metadata.title: CVE-2015-7337 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The editor in IPython Notebook before 3.2.2 and Jupyter Notebook 4.0.xbefore 4.0.5 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary JavaScript codevia a crafted file, which triggers a redirect to files/, related to MIMEtypes.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7337` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ipython - 5.5.0-1
ipython3 - 5.5.0-1
python-ipython - 5.5.0-1
python3-ipython - 5.5.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ipython package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.5.0-1').
